description: Detects different process creation events as described in Malwarebytes's threat report on Lazarus group activity
false_positives: Should not be any false positives
name: Lazarus Activity
query: ((process.command_line:*mshta* AND process.command_line:*.zip*) OR (process.parent.executable:"C\:\\Windows\\System32\\wbem\\wmiprvse.exe" AND process.executable:"C\:\\Windows\\System32\\mshta.exe") OR (process.parent.executable:*\:\\Users\\Public\\* AND process.executable:"C\:\\Windows\\System32\\rundll32.exe"))
author: Bhabesh Raj
